item.description:
Friday 2/29. topic: Karma Yoga: the Awakening to Eco-Spirituality. 7 - 9 p.m. All are welcomed. Bring a friend.

Karma Yoga is selfless service. From a spiritual perspective, positive action creates dynamic change is one's neighborhood, workplace, religious community etc. Learn about helping the world, environmentally, politically, and locally one action at a time for a more peaceful world and healthier planet. This will be followed by refreshments and courteous fellowship.


Includes chanting and meditation. We will train newbies.
item.how_to_find_us: Visit our web site for directions and phone number. We meet in a Condo; we keep the light on and there is plenty of free street parking.
item.why: Inspiring people, friendly people, fun people and socially conscious people.
item.name: KARMA YOGA: the Awakening to Eco-Spirituality
